Package net.nergi.util

Interface ThrowingRunnable<T extends Throwable>

public interface ThrowingRunnable<T extends Throwable>
An Runnable derivative that is allowed to throw exceptions. Lambdas that can be used to form normal Runnables can also be used to create ThrowingRunnables.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void run()
    Run this ThrowingRunnable's method, where any exceptions thrown inside are propagated outwards.
    default Runnable toRunnable()
    Convert this ThrowingRunnable to a normal Runnable that throws an unchecked FallThroughException if an exception is thrown while running it.

  • Method Details

    • run

      void run() throws T extends Throwable
      Run this ThrowingRunnable's method, where any exceptions thrown inside are propagated outwards.
      Throws:
      T - Any exception thrown inside.

    • toRunnable

      default Runnable toRunnable()
      Convert this ThrowingRunnable to a normal Runnable that throws an unchecked FallThroughException if an exception is thrown while running it.
      Returns:
      A Runnable that throws unchecked exceptions.
